document_api_meta.title: Create Global Product
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Create global products to be sold in one or multiple shops outside of the seller's base country.
You can only create global products in `AVAILABLE` product categories. For other categories, contact your account manager for assistance. After product creation, use the [Publish Global Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a64d6defece02be678fd6) to publish and translate the product in the desired markets.
**Key concept**: Global products are products created by cross-border sellers to be sold in shops outside of their base country. With global products, cross-border sellers operating across multiple markets can avoid creating the same product for each shop individually. Instead, they just need to create a single global product, which can be published and synced to all their shops, simplifying product management across markets.
**Note**:
- This API is applicable only for intra-EU sellers and global sellers. To create and list local products intended for sale exclusively in local shops, use the [Create Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6502fc8da57708028b42b18a) instead.
- There may be a limit to the number of products you can list per day. We recommend prioritizing the creation of key products first to ensure they get published. You can find your listing limit on the Seller Center homepage.
- The language used in the product content must align with the target market's language (e.g. don't use Chinese), otherwise the listing will fail or be rejected.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_body_param.name: title
request_body_param.desc:
The product title. 
Title length:
- DE, ES, FR, IE, IT, JP, UK, US: [1, 255] 
- MX:[1,300] 
- Other regions: [25, 255]

request_body_param.name: description
request_body_param.desc: The product description in HTML format. **Note**: - The content must conform to the [HTML syntax](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/). All HTML tags are accepted but to optimize display on the TikTok Shop product detail page, the system will automatically convert certain tags into alternative formats, such as rendering `` tags as images. - Max length: 10,000 characters. - Image guidelines: You must use [TikTok Shop image URLs](6509df95defece02be598a22). Max 30 `` tags, each under 4000px with `src`, `width`, and `height` attributes. **Recommendations**: - If you are syncing a pre-existing description from another platform, include the full HTML source description here. - Provide a detailed description, ideally over 300 characters. - Include 3-5 key selling points, each under 250 characters, with supporting images. - Use 1600x1600 px for the image dimensions.

request_body_param.name: category_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the category of this product. 
- It must be a leaf category that corresponds to the category tree type specified in the `category_version` property. 
- It must be a main category (`categories.permission_statuses=AVAILABLE` in [Get Global Categories API](650a03f8f1fd3102b91b338a)).
**Note**: Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for information on product category restrictions.

request_body_param.name: brand_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the brand of this product. 

**Note**: Unauthorized brands won't be displayed on TikTok Shop.

request_body_param.name: main_images
request_body_param.desc:
A list of images to display in the product image gallery.
- Max count: 9
- Arrange your image URIs in the sequence that they should appear on TikTok Shop.
- Image dimensions: [300x300 px, 4000x4000 px]
  
**Recommendations**:
- Use a minimum of 5 images.
- The first image should have a white background. Use the [Optimize Images API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/665692b35d39dc02deb49a97) to change the background to white.

request_body_param.name: ^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image. 
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=MAIN_IMAGE`. You can use the returned URI directly, or process it through the [Optimize Images API](665692b35d39dc02deb49a97) first and use the resulting URI.

request_body_param.name: skus
request_body_param.desc:
A list of global Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

**Note**:
- Max SKUs for EU, JP, UK, US: 300
- Max SKUs for other regions: 100

**Recommendations**: Place the most important variant at the beginning of the array.

request_body_param.name: ^global_quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The total SKU inventory quantity across all shops globally. 

The inventory for each local shop is automatically calculated when a product is first published. After publishing, this global quantity cannot be manually changed. You can only modify the inventory quantity in each local shop.

request_body_param.name: ^sales_attributes
request_body_param.desc:
A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

**Note**: 
- You can omit this object if there is only 1 SKU. Otherwise, this is **required**.
- You can only have up to 3 types of sales attributes per product.
- Each SKU must include the same number and type of sales attributes. For example, you cannot have one SKU that has only a Color attribute, while another SKU has both Color and Size attributes.
- Provide either a built-in ID or a custom name; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.
- The `id/name` and `value_id/value_name` pairs must be unique in each SKU. For example, you cannot repeat `"name": "Color"`, `"value_name": "Red"` in different SKUs.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of a built-in sales attribute, retrieved from [Get Global Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a).

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom sales attribute name if the built-in attributes do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after listing.

**Note**: 
- Do not include sensitive characters.
- Max length: 20 characters

request_body_param.name: ^^value_id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of a built-in sales attribute value, retrieved from the [Get Global Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a).

request_body_param.name: ^^value_name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom sales attribute value if the built-in values do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after listing.

**Note**:
- No duplicates allowed under the same attribute.
- Max length: 50 characters.
- Supports only alphabets and numbers.

request_body_param.name: ^^sku_img
request_body_param.desc:
An image to display for the SKU.

You can attach images to only 1 type of sales attribute, and you must attach an image for each value of the chosen attribute. For example, if a product has 2 colors and 3 sizes, you can choose to attach images for either the Color sales attribute or the Size sales attribute. If you choose to attach images for Color, you must attach 2 images, one for each color.

request_body_param.name: ^^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=ATTRIBUTE_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^seller_sku
request_body_param.desc:
An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.  
- Valid length: 1-50 characters
- Format: Text without spaces

request_body_param.name: ^price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's **global uniform pre-tax** price that serves as the baseline for calculating the local prices across different markets.

**Note**: 
- Upon publishing, this price will be automatically converted to the local pre-tax price and local display price based on market-specific exchange rates and applicable charges such as shipping costs, taxes, and other fees.
- The auto-conversion will exclude JP and US shops using China warehouses.

request_body_param.name: ^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The price amount.
Max: 99,999,999.99

request_body_param.name: ^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values:
- `USD`: Applicable for global sellers
- `EUR`: Applicable for intra-EU sellers

request_body_param.name: ^identifier_code
request_body_param.desc:
A regulated identifier code assigned to a product based on international standardized regulations (e.g. GTIN) to ensure the product is universally identifiable across various platforms and systems.

**IMPORTANT**: This object and its values can only be modified when the product is in DRAFT status. Once submitted for review, changes are not allowed. Please define the values carefully.

request_body_param.name: ^^code
request_body_param.desc:
The identifier code.

**Format**:
- GTIN: 14 digits 
- EAN: 8, 13, or 14 digits 
- UPC: 12 digits 
- ISBN: 13 digits, or 9 digits ending in capital `X`
- JAN: 8 or 13 digits

**Note**: The identifier code must be unique for each SKU, with no repetition allowed.

request_body_param.name: ^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of identifier code.
Possible values:
- GTIN
- EAN
- UPC
- ISBN
- JAN

request_body_param.name: ^inventory
request_body_param.desc:
SKU inventory information per warehouse.
If multi-warehouse is enabled in Seller Center, you must provide the inventory details for each warehouse. 
Max count: 50

**Note**: `global_quantity` will not take effect if inventory details are provided for each warehouse.

request_body_param.name: ^^global_warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the global warehouse where the SKU is stored. 
Retrieve the list of global warehouses available for the seller from the [Get Global Seller Warehouse API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa3f0defece02be6e5ffb).

request_body_param.name: ^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 99,999]

request_body_param.name: ^sku_unit_count
request_body_param.desc:
The total quantity/volume of the product represented by the SKU.
For example, if the SKU represents 500ml of water, this value would be 500 if the unit type is defined as ml.
Valid range: [0.01, 99,999.9999] 
Applicable only for the EU market.

**Note**: 
- This is mainly used to calculate the unit price of the SKU, and is required only if you wish to display the unit price to facilitate easier price comparisons across different products and packaging sizes.
- Unit price = Selling price/(SKU unit count/base unit count). Therefore if you want to obtain the unit price, you would also need to define the "base unit count" and the "unit type" product attributes. Retrieve the relevant information for these product attributes by using the [Get Global Attributes API](650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a). The unit price would then be returned in the [Get Global Product API](6509e2b0bace3e02b7490c96).

request_body_param.name: ^extra_identifier_codes
request_body_param.desc:
If the SKU belongs to a virtual bundle (containing multiple individual SKUs), you can add up to 10 additional identifier codes here for the SKUs included in the bundle.

**Format**:
GTIN: 14 digits 
EAN: 8, 13, or 14 digits 
UPC: 12 digits 
ISBN: 13 digits, or 9 digits ending in capital `X`

**Note**: 
- Applicable only for the EU market. 
- The identifier code must be unique for each SKU, with no repetition allowed.

request_body_param.name: ^external_global_sku_id
request_body_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the global SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

request_body_param.name: package_weight
request_body_param.desc:
The weight of the product package.

**Note**:
- Provide the weight measured after packing the product.
- This value impacts the shipping cost, so it is important to ensure that the measurements are accurate. Any discrepancies may lead to additional shipping fees.
- The package weight will take precedence over package dimensions in fee calculation if the fee based on weight is higher.

request_body_param.name: ^value
request_body_param.desc: The package weight, which must be a positive number with up to 3 decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc: The unit for the package weight. Only `KILOGRAM` is supported.

request_body_param.name: certifications
request_body_param.desc:
The list of certifications for your product.
Max count: 10

As per TikTok Shop guidelines, certifications are required for certain restricted product categories. Retrieve the certification requirements for your product from the  [Get Global Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e). Refer to [TikTok Shop Restricted Products Policy](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?identity=1&role=1&knowledge_id=3238037484275457&from=policy) for information on product category restrictions.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID to identify the type of certification required for the product category.
Retrieve this value from the [Get Global Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e).

request_body_param.name: ^images
request_body_param.desc: A list of certification related images.

request_body_param.name: ^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the image. 
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=CERTIFICATION_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^files
request_body_param.desc: A list of certification related files.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the certification file.
Use the [Upload Product File API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509dffdc16ffe02b8dc10c5) to upload the files first and obtain the corresponding file ID.

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc: The name of the certification file, including the file extension.

request_body_param.name: ^^format
request_body_param.desc: The format of the certification file. Only PDF is supported.

request_body_param.name: package_dimensions
request_body_param.desc:
The dimensions of the product package.

**Note**:
- Provide the dimensions measured after packing the product.
- These values impact the shipping cost, so it is important to ensure that dimensions are accurate. Any discrepancies may lead to additional shipping fees.

request_body_param.name: ^length
request_body_param.desc: The package length. A positive whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^width
request_body_param.desc: The package width. A positive whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^height
request_body_param.desc: The package height. A positive whole number.

request_body_param.name: ^unit
request_body_param.desc: The unit for the package dimensions. Only `CENTIMETER` is supported.

request_body_param.name: product_attributes
request_body_param.desc:
A list of general attributes (e.g. manufacturer, country of origin, materials used) that describe the product as a whole, regardless of variant.

**Important**: The attributes available for use are determined by the system based on the product's assigned category, with some being mandatory. You must provide the product attributes marked as `is_required` in the response of the [Get Global Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a).

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of the product attribute, retrieved from the [Get Global Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a).

request_body_param.name: ^values
request_body_param.desc:
A list of selectable values for the product attribute.
Max count: 300 for US; 100 for other regions.

**Note**: Provide either a built-in ID or a custom name; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of a built-in product attribute value, retrieved from the [Get Global Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a0483c16ffe02b8dfc80a).

request_body_param.name: ^^name
request_body_param.desc:
A self-defined custom product attribute value if the built-in values do not satisfy your needs. The system will auto-generate an ID after listing.

**Note**: 
- No duplicates allowed under the same attribute.
- Max length: 2000 characters
- Supports only alphabets and numbers.

request_body_param.name: size_chart
request_body_param.desc:
The measurement details of the product to help buyers find the right size.

**Note**: 
- For certain product categories, size charts may be required or not supported. Use the [Get Global Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e) to check the requirements.
- If size charts are not supported, even if you provide a size chart here, the size chart will not be saved.
- Provide either a TikTok Shop size chart template ID or a size chart image; if both are provided, the ID takes priority.

request_body_param.name: ^image
request_body_param.desc:
An image of the size chart.

**Recommendations**:
- Resolution: Minimum 1024px on the shorter side
- Content: Include key measurement dimensions (e.g., bust, waist, hips, inseam), the more the better.
- Format: Use a table with distinct columns and row.
   - Use only one table per product and image.
   - Display each dimension in a separate row.
   - Display units in column headers.

request_body_param.name: ^^uri
request_body_param.desc:
The URI of the size chart image.
Obtain this URI by uploading the images through the [Upload Product Image API](6509df95defece02be598a22)  with `use_case=SIZE_CHART_IMAGE`.

request_body_param.name: ^template
request_body_param.desc: A TikTok Shop size chart template generated by the size chart tool in Seller Center > Manage Products > Bulk action > Batch manage size charts.

request_body_param.name: ^^id
request_body_param.desc: The size chart template ID.

request_body_param.name: video
request_body_param.desc:
A product introduction or promotion video to display for your product.

**Recommendations**:
- Aspect ratio: 1:1 
- Resolution: HD 720p or higher
- Duration: 20 - 60 seconds

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the product video.
Use the [Upload Product File API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509dffdc16ffe02b8dc10c5) to upload the video first and obtain the corresponding file ID.

request_body_param.name: manufacturer
request_body_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. Use `manufacturer_ids` instead.)

The product manufacturer's details.
**Note**: You must fill in all the nested properties for the manufacturer's information to be valid.

request_body_param.name: ^name
request_body_param.desc: The name of the manufacturer.

request_body_param.name: ^address
request_body_param.desc: The address of the manufacturer.

request_body_param.name: ^phone_number
request_body_param.desc:
The phone number of the manufacturer, prefixed by a plus `+` symbol. 
There must be a space or hyphen between the country code and the local phone number.

request_body_param.name: ^email
request_body_param.desc: The email address of the manufacturer.

request_body_param.name: category_version
request_body_param.desc:
The category tree version to assign this product to.
Possible values based on region:
- US: `v2`, represents the 7-level category tree.
  **Important**: If the seller account contains an active US shop, you must pass `v2` when using this API.
- Other regions: `v1`, represents the 3-level category tree.
Default: `v1`

request_body_param.name: responsible_person_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of responsible person IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Responsible Persons API](67066a55f17b7d02f95d2fb1).
**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Global Category Rules API](650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: manufacturer_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of manufacturer IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Manufacturers API](67066a580dcee902fa03ccf9).
**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Global Category Rules API](650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: source_locale
request_body_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale code representing the source language used for specifying the product information.
Default: en-US
Possible values:
- de-DE
- en-IE
- es-ES
- fr-FR
- it-IT

**Note**: 
- Applicable only for intra-EU sellers. Other sellers can ignore this field and provide the product information in English.
- The information provided will be automatically translated into all EU languages supported by TikTok Shop. Ensure the locale matches the language used in field values to avoid inaccurate translations.

request_body_param.name: external_global_product_id
request_body_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the global product between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^global_product_id
response_param.desc: The global product ID generated by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^global_skus
response_param.desc: A list of global Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The global SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. One product can contain multiple SKU IDs.

response_param.name: ^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^sales_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc:
The sales attribute ID. 
If you included the custom sales attribute name in the request, this is a newly generated ID.

response_param.name: ^^^value_id
response_param.desc:
The sales attribute value ID. 
If you included the custom sales attribute value name in the request, this is a newly generated ID.

response_param.name: ^^external_global_sku_id
response_param.desc:
An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the global SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform. 
Max length: 999 characters

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
product description is invalid
product package weight is invalid
brand id is invalid
property is invalid
No matching categories. Provide the full name of your product, edit its product properties, and try again.

Missing variations (sales attributes). When there are multiple SKUs in a product, each SKU must include variation (sales attribute) details that explain how it is different from other SKUs in the product.
Incorrect price format
The product description cannot exceed maximum characters
The product description is required
The parcel weight is required
Category does not exist
Category is not final category
Brand does not exist
Main product image is required
You cannot edit the specified product(s) as it isn't listed in your account or shop.
A single product cannot have more than 100 different SKUs
The product name exceed max limit characters
The seller SKU text length cannot exceed max limit characters
The SKU inventory quantity for the warehouse must be within allowed limits.
The num of image in description cannot exceed max limit
The product price is invalid
The provided currency is not available for this shop/region.
Unable to update the price for SKUs with no warehouse. Assign a warehouse and try again.
property is required
required qualification miss
product package size is invalid
Size chart not found
no permission of multi global warehouse
sku warehouse must equal
brand is expired
You are not authorized to sell this brand in this category. To do so, apply through the Qualification Center in Seller Center.
A brand authorization is required to publish this listing.
Incorrect category version. For US shops or global sellers with an active US shop, specify 'category version=v2'. For shops in other regions specify 'category_version=v1'.
This category is prohibited or unsupported on TikTok Shop. Select another category.
Only whitelisted sellers are permitted to trade under current category
category do not support cod
You are not authorized to sell in this category because it does not fall under your shop's main category. Contact your account manager for help or select another category.
This category is restricted. To sell in this category, apply through the Qualification Center in Seller Center.
the category is unauthorized or unavailable

The specified category ID is not a leaf category, or it does not belong to the specified category version. Note: For US shops or global sellers with an active US shop, specify 'category_version=v2'. For shops in other regions, specify 'category_version=v1'. Use the Get Categories/Get Global Categories endpoint to check the leaf categories that belong to the required category version.
Do not support custom property.
attribute name or attribute id is empty.
The attribute name characters cannot exceed max_limit
The product attribute or sale attribute name characters contain Chinese.
The attribute name duplicate.
The product attributes contained invalid characters. Please modify and re-submit.
The {{property_type}} not support multi selected, attribute id is :{{property_id}}.
Do not support custom product attribute.
The {{property_type}}  value name or attribute value id is empty.
The {{property_type}} value name characters cannot exceed {{max_limit}}, attribute value name is :{{property_value_name}}.
The {{property_type}} value name characters contain Chinese.
Duplicated attribute values found for an attribute. Remove or modify the duplicated value.
Duplicate attribute id
The product ID does not exist
product name is empty
Chinese characters are not supported in product name
The product name contains non-English characters.
Product manufacturer is required.
Manufacturer ID {{manufacturer_id}} is not associated with the seller
Product responsible person is required
The number of responsible person ids cannot exceed {{max_limit}}, and cannot less {{min_limit}}.
Responsible person ID {{rp_id}} is not associated with the seller
When identifier code is not filled in, extra identification code is not allowed to be filled in.
Duplicate manufacturer IDs associated with the same product
Duplicate responsible person IDs associated with the same product
product main image uri illegal
Width and length of main image must be at least {{min_limit}}, check uri {{uri}}
The main images size exceed limit.
Main product image format not support.
The main images aspect ratio cannot exceed max limit.
main product images count exceed limit
Product description image file format is not supported
product description image uri illegal
The description images size cannot exceed limit.
The description images space cannot exceed limit.
Product description image format not support.
The product  description html syntax with error
The product description html tag not support.
The product description has Chinese characters
The product description html tag required attribute is miss.
The product description html tag not support nest.
The product description html tag contain illegal attribute.
The product description contains non-English characters.
The product description nest exceeding limit
The video id is not exist.
package weight exceed limit.
product sale property image uri illegal
The sale property images size over limit.
Product sale property image is required
Product sale property image format not support.
The sale property image aspect ratio invalid
The attribute max num cannot exceed 3.
The attribute value max num over limit.
The sale attribute id not exist.
You can add images to only 1 product variation, which will serve as the primary variation for display in the product options gallery.
The property value id not exist.
The warehouse ' {{warehouse ID}} ' does not belong to this shop/seller.
The warehouse is disabled.
SKU property must contain all properties
sku name contain Chinese characters
product price exceed limit
unit price config is invalid
Invalid number of digits of identifier code
